General.Name: Nanjing Cosmos Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing COSMOS Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of daily chemical raw materials. The company's products include sunscreen and other cosmetic active ingredients, synthetic fragrance ingredients, aromatic raw materials, and other raw materials and intermediates. It sells its products primarily in Europe and the United States. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
